Title: Pictorial explanation of the First Five Year Plan (1953-1957) for the development of the national economy of our nation
Designer: General Political Department of the Chinese People's Liberation Army (中国人民解放军总政治部)
Notes: "Pictorial explanation of the First Five Year Plan (1953-1957) for the development of the national economy of our nation" (我国发展国民经济的第一个五年(1953-1957)计划图解) is a series of 12 posters, ca. 1955, possibly incomplete.The third sheet, "Construction scale and increased annual production capacity of major industries within five years" (五年内主要工业的建设规模和增加的年产能力), shows various industries and the products they turn out, with estimated increases.
